TopicTitle: Bracket Keys should switch IVA perspective.

Articles.Content: You know how in 3rd person view, pressing the [ and ] keys switch ships? The same should happen in IVA but it should cycle through the interior perspectives. As far as I can tell the only way to do that is double clicking currently and brackets do nothing in IVA.
Keep pressing the switch to IVA button, (C, I think) and it will change perspectives
Consistency in control scheme is a good thing. This is a much better idea than the current method.

[quote name='TheCanadianVendingMachine']Keep pressing the switch to IVA button, (C, I think) and it will change perspectives[/QUOTE]


He mentions double clicking, so he is probably talking about the "look out of the window" feature that you have in the IVA.

[quote name='nikokespprfan']He mentions double clicking, so he is probably talking about the "look out of the window" feature that you have in the IVA.[/QUOTE]

That, and simply changing the Kerbal you are looking from (or cargo bag as the case may be). It would also allow you to switch to the new Mk1 Docking Mode without the button.

[quote name='angrysheep']Press V[/QUOTE]

That ONLY switches between Kerbals. There are many more perspectives other than Kerbals that V won't take you to.

EDIT: Oh and I don't think V should change either. It's useful to switch between Kerbals, especially if using the RPM mod, without going to places only useful for screenshots and such.
